name: The cloak of the black circle
data: It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'stunning blow'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'remove preference'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
